brewery.brewery_description:
Founded in 2011, The Bronx Brewery is a craft brewery based in New York City's South Bronx neighborhood.

The Bronx Brewery team prides themselves on four principles, infusing everything the Brewery does: innovation, approachability, creativity and community. 

Visit www.thebronxbrewery.com or @TheBronxBrewery on social to learn more, or visit their Taproom, Brewery and Backyard at 856 East 136th Street, Bronx, NY 10454.

beer.beer_name: Tavern On the Green Summer Ale

beer.beer_description: This balanced and refreshing pale ale is perfect for summer days in the city.  Brewed with British and American 2-row malts, a unique experimental hop variety and dried lemon peel, it offers a subtle and crisp citrus note.  It is dry-hopped, unfiltered and unpasteurized.

beer.beer_description:

Full-bodied and juicy, packed with orange, mango and pineapple, this one’s brewed to celebrate the lights in these hazy times.

Hop Bill: Azacca, Comet, Nugget, Samba, Idaho 7, Northern Brewer

Grain Bill: Briess Pilsen, White Wheat, Raw White Wheat, Red Wheat, Flaked Oats

Husband | Father | Sales Manager | Seeker of Craft Beer and a Jedi, like My Father before Me.
Hiker, homebrewer, metalhead, craft beer enthusiast. Owner of WickCraft Beer Candles

beer.beer_description: Strap on your taste buds and kick off your flavor adventure with 'Boot Beer,' a rugged West Coast IPA boasting a hearty 6.7% ABV & a sturdy 55 IBUs. Crafted with a blend of 2Row, Red Wheat, and Flaked Rice malts, it sets the stage for a hop-forward experience like no other featuring Motueka, Vic Secret, Ella, and Chinook. Each sip delivers a boot-load of pine, citrus, and tropical fruit flavors, inviting you to stomp through the rugged terrain of taste and embrace the wild spirit of the West Coast!

This balanced and refreshing pale ale is perfect for summer days in the city.  Brewed with British and American 2-row malts, a unique experimental hop variety and dried lemon peel, it offers a subtle and crisp citrus note.  It is dry-hopped, unfiltered and unpasteurized.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 50 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 11. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 330 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 115 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 24! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description:
This deep amber American-style pale ale is brewed with 5 different barley malts, generous additions of Cascade and Centennial hops, and a unique strain of yeast. 

You'll notice a big malt presence, balancing out the bold hop profile.

It is dry-hopped, unfiltered, and unpasteurized.

If you are looking for a beer to satisfy your New Year's resolution, make no mistake -- this isn't it. This brew brings hop aromas & bitterness in a big way -- a variety of hops create a spectrum of aromas ranging from citrus, pine, musky, tropical fruit to lemon grass. With a 7.6% ABV and a heavy hop guarantee this is the ideal beer for those who go No Resolutions. Cheers!

This balanced and refreshing pale ale is perfect for summer days in the city.  Brewed with British and American 2-row malts, a unique experimental hop variety and dried lemon peel, it offers a subtle and crisp citrus note.  It is dry-hopped, unfiltered and unpasteurized.

Soft. Tropical. Juicy. 
Full-bodied and juicy, packed with orange, mango and pineapple, this one’s brewed to celebrate the lights in these hazy times.

Hop Bill: Azacca, Comet, Nugget, Samba, Idaho 7, Northern Brewer

Grain Bill: Briess Pilsen, White Wheat, Raw White Wheat, Red Wheat, Flaked Oats
A Massive Double IPA With A Strong Malt Character And Big Fruit Hop Flavor.

Malted and flaked rye make up nearly a quarter of the grain bill for this Rye Pale Ale, offering it a unique and intense spicy rye flavor and golden-orange hue.  Chinook and Crystal hops lend a gentle bitterness and spicy, piney and herbal character and aroma to this rich, bold rye beer.

A cloudy, juicy IPA with lots of tropical fruit flavor.

One thing the Bronx isn’t short on is toughness. Its strong work ethic and no-nonsense attitude is why we chose to brew our beer here. And in the spirit of the character of the Bronx, we created this tough as nails, Northeast IPA. Full bodied, hazy with tastes of orange, mango, and pineapple, it’s a brew made big & bold like the borough that inspired it.

Our banner beer for those who make stuff happen.

Bronx Banner is a Kolsch-inspired ale that is brewed using Belgian pilsner, American wheat malts & classic Bavarian hops.  It’s brilliantly clear-filtered, soft and perfectly balanced.

Big floral and tropical aromas set up this delightfully balanced white IPA.

Soft yet slightly tart wheat and lightly toasted malts are complemented by the gentle bitterness of the hops.  Our brewers use late hop additions and dry hopping in the brewing process to give this IPA its big hop nose without an overwhelmingly bitter taste.  This brew is love at first smell.  Cheers!

Loads of tropical fruit – guava, passion fruit and ripe mango – on the nose, a clean, light body, leading to a refreshingly tart, red wheat malt finish establish this easy-drinking yet wonderfully hoppy 5.0% ABV session IPA.

Easy drinking IPA with loads of tropical hops & subtle tart finish.
To keep pace in New York City you've got to be able to get things done in a New York minute.  It's a fast-paced, frenzied lifestyle that we love being part of but now and then it's good to pump the brakes a bit and slow it all down.  This Session IPA is perfect for those chill moments when you want to lean back and take it all in. We brew this IPA with two of our favorite hops for some amazing tropical fruit aromas and add red wheat malt to give it a crisp, tart finish.  An easy drinking 4.6% ABV makes this the ideal brew for when it's time to Slow Your Roll.

beer.beer_name: Smile My Guy Happy Hoppy IPA

beer.beer_description: Two strains of Trappist yeast, one Belgian ale yeast, and Belgian candi sugar highlight this remarkably intricate, fruity, spicy, and earthy straw-colored Belgian Pale Ale. Belgian Pilsner and Biscuit malts from Beloeil and German Vienna malts from Bamberg provide a clean backdrop for the spicy and lightly herbal Sterling hops. A votre santé from the Bronx.
A slightly sour, crisp and refreshing Northeast IPA with a juicy punch.
A slightly tart Northeast IPA brewed in collaboration with Swedish brewery, Sigtuna.

This Black Pale Ale offers a smooth and complex contrast of dark chocolate and roasted malt flavors with bright and tropical guava, mango and pear hop flavors and aromas.  Three different American malts stand up to generous amounts of West Coast El Dorado and Citra hops in an unfiltered and unpasteurized ale.  Embrace the darkness of the winter with this hoppy black ale.

Seriously juicy & dank, while incredibly light and super-drinkable. Tropical and stone fruits will dominate the flavor profile with dank, herbal and pine notes following close by. 

The perfect beer to pair with a juicy burger from our friends at Bastard Burgers!

Aroma: Tropical notes, mango, pineapple, guava, stone fruit, pine

Flavor: tropical, lactose, biscuit undertones

Velvety mouthfeel
An amber colored pale ale brewed with cinnamon, molasses, cloves & ginger that delivers a delightful winter spiced flavor.
Ale brewed with tangerines.

beer.beer_name: Spring Pale Ale w/ Black Tea and Chamomile
beer.beer_description: A blend of black and chamomile teas brewed to perfect balance with 2 row barley malts and refreshing lemongrass and pine hop bitterness.
Hard hitting IPA Brewed with loads of Crystal Hops

A Bronx take on a Christmas ale - using amburana wood to infuse the beer with holiday cheer instead of the traditional spice additions in the kettle. 

Mild pleasant bitterness with a blend of vanilla/cinnamon/oak/chocolate on the nose. A grassy and mildly spicy and citrusy palate washed over additional notes of vanilla and oak on the back. 

The perfect cozy sweater beer!
